MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA13 postcode area of Lymm, affecting properties in Warrington Road, Pool Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.16am. Our engineers on site have confirmed a fault on the underground equipment outside Statham Lodge. Due to repairs required we now expect power to be restored by 2pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.11am on Jan 23, 2021
